wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: I don't want you to get too excited over nothing. Please, sit. Why don't you enjoy a cup of calming jasmine tea?

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Power in firebending comes from the breath. Not the muscles. The breath becomes energy in the body. The energy extends past your limbs and becomes fire.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: You have yet to master your basics. Drill it again!

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: It seems... I've lost my lotus tile. Most people think the lotus tile insignificant, but it is essential for the unusual strategy that I employ.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: I always say the only thing better than finding something you were looking for, is finding something you weren't looking for at a great bargain!

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Things will never return to normal. But the important thing is, the Avatar gives us hope.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Take care of yourselves. Never be afraid to reach out to those who can help you!

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Ahh! See, a moment of quiet is good for your mental well being.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Winter, spring, summer and fall. Winter and spring, summer and fall. Four seasons, four loves. Four seasons, four loves.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: It's a lovely night for a walk. Why don't you join me? It would clear your head. Or, just stay in your room and sit in the dark. Whatever makes you happy.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: No nephew of mine is going to stow away on a ship without some backup!

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Be careful what you wish for. History is not always kind to its subjects.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: If you're fishing for an octopus, my nephew, you need a tightly woven net or he will squeeze through the tiniest hole and escape.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: I'm sorry, I just nag you because, well, ever since I lost my son... I think of you as my own.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Remember your Breathe of Fire! It could save your life out there! And put your hood up, keep your ears warm!

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Aaahhh... this is what I've been missing. Who knew floating on a piece of driftwood for three weeks with no food or water and sea vultures waiting to pluck out your liver could make one so tense?

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Look at these magnificent shells! I'll enjoy these keepsakes for years to come.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Family sticks together, right?

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: You're looking at the rare white dragon bush. Its leaves make a tea so delicious it's heartbreaking! That, or it's the white jade bush, which is poisonous. Delectable tea? Or deadly poison?

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: To be honest with you, the best tea tastes delicious whether it comes in a porcelain pot or a tin cup.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: You must never give in to despair. Allow yourself to slip down that road and you surrender to your lowest instincts. In the darkest times, hope is something you give yourself. That is the meaning of inner strength.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: I poured your tea because I wanted to and for no other reason.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: You sound like my nephew. Always thinking you need to do things on your own without anyone's support. There is nothing wrong with letting people who love you help you.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: I know he doesn't want me around right now, but, if he needs me, I'll be there.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Sharing tea with a fascinating stranger is one of life's true delights.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Lightning is a pure expression of firebending, without aggression. It is not fueled by rage or emotion the way other firebending is. To perform the technique requires peace of mind.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: There is energy all around us. The energy is both yin and yang; positive energy and negative energy. Remember, once you separate the energy, you do not command it. You are simply its humble guide.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: You must let go of your feelings of shame if you want your anger to go away. Pride is not the opposite of shame, but its source. True humility is the only antidote to shame.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: It is important to draw wisdom from many different places. If we take it from only one place, it becomes rigid and stale. Understanding others, the other elements, and the other nations will help you become whole.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: It is the combination of the four elements in one person that makes the Avatar so powerful. But, it can make you more powerful too.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: The stomach is the source of energy in your body. It is called the sea of chi. Only in my case, it is more like a vast ocean!

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: It's nice to see old friends!

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: I always tried to tell you that Pai Sho is more than just a game.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Who would have thought, after all these years, I'd return to the scene of my greatest military disgrace... as a tourist!

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: So, Smellerbee, that's an unusual name for a young man. Oh, now I see! It's a beautiful name for a lovely girl!

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: I believe people can change their lives if they want to. I believe in second chances.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Uh, no no no. But may I just say that you're like a flower in bloom, your beauty intoxicating.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: I know you're not supposed to cry over spilled tea, but... that's so sad.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Sick of tea? That's like being sick of breathing!

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: The secret ingredient is love.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: The moonflower likes partial shade.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: It is usually best to admit mistakes when they occur, and to seek to restore honor.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: With a poor stance you are unbalanced, and you can be easily knocked over. With a solid stance, you are a much more serious threat.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: While it is always best to believe in one's self, a little help from others can be a great blessing.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Happy Birthday my son. If only I could have helped you.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Good tea is its own reward.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: So, I was thinking about names for my new tea shop. How about the Jasmine Dragon? It's dramatic, poetic, has a nice ring to it.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: There is nothing wrong with a life of peace and prosperity. I suggest you think about what it is that you want for your life, and why.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: What do you plan to do now that you have found the Avatar's bison? Keep it locked in our new apartment? Should I go put on a pot of tea for him?

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Is it your own destiny? Or is it a destiny someone else has tried to force on you? It's time for you to look inward, and begin asking yourself the big questions. Who are you? And what do you want?

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: You're going through a metamorphosis. It will not be a pleasant experience, but when you come out of it, you will be the beautiful person you were always meant to be.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Who thought when we came to this city as refugees, that I'd end up owning my own tea shop. Follow your passion, and life will reward you.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Many times, I imagined myself here, at the threshold of the palace. But I always thought I would be here as a conqueror... instead, we are the Earth Kings personal guests, here to serve him tea. Destiny is a funny thing.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Did I ever tell you how I got the nickname the "Dragon of the West"?

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: The key to both good tea and good advice is proper aging. What's on your mind?

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Perfection and power are overrated. I think you were very wise to choose happiness and love.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: I don't know the answer. Sometimes life is like this dark tunnel. You can't always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you just keep moving... You will come to a better place.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Look into your heart and see what it is that you truly want.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: You know, destiny is a funny thing. You never know how things are going to work out. But if you keep an open mind and an open heart, I promise you will find your own destiny someday.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: I was never angry with you. I was sad because I was afraid you lost your way. But you found it again. And you did it by yourself. And I am so happy you found your way here.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: You struggled, you suffered but you have always followed your own path, you restored your own honour.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: After I re-conquer Ba Sing Se, I'm going to re-conquer my tea shop and I'm going to play Pai Sho everyday.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Today, destiny is our friend. I know it.

wisdom.name: Iroh
wisdom.quote: Hey, my belly's not that big anymore! I've really trimmed down.
